label: 大仏殿
対訳語: The Great Buddha Hall of Tōdai-ji
本: Exhibition of Shōsō-in Treasures , The 52nd  . Nara National Museum . 2000
説明文: The Great Buddha Hall of Tōdai-ji, constructed by Emperor Shōmu and completed in 751. It houses the Great Buddha of Nara, Birushana  (Vairocana)  , and was the venue for the Kaigen-e, the Consecration Ceremony of the Great Buddha, on 9 April 752. [聖武天皇、毘盧舎那、開眼会]
